SocialPost.name: SocialPost
SocialPost.description: Represents a snapshot of a post on a social network such as a Facebook or Twitter.

AnalyzerScore.description: Score set on the social post in Social Studio.

AssignedTo.description: User in Social Studio that the social post is assigned to.

AttachmentType.description: Type of the first attachment on the social post. Values are: APPLICATION AUDIO IMAGE LINK TEXT UNKNOWN VIDEO

AttachmentUrl.description: URL for the first attachment on the social post.

Classification.description: Classification for the social post, such as inquiry or customer case.

CommentCount.description: Number of comments on the social post.

DeletedById.description: If the social post is deleted, ID of the person who deleted the social post.

EngagementLevel.description: Engagement level of the social post, such as reviewed or resolved.

ExternalPostId.description: ID of the social post in its social network.

Handle.description: Handle of the person who posted the social post.

HarvestDate.description: Date and time when Social Studio collected the social post.

HiddenById.description: If the social post is hidden, ID of the person who hid it.

InboundLinkCount.description: Number of links on the inbound social post.

IsOutbound.description: Specifies whether the social post is outbound or not.

KeywordGroupName.description: Radian6 field that is no longer used.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date when the social post was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: Date when the social post was last viewed.

LikedBy.description: ID of the managed social account in the social network that liked the social post.

LikesAndVotes.description: Radian6 number of likes and votes on the social post.

MediaProvider.description: Social network of the social post.

MediaType.description: Type of social network of the social post.

MessageType.description: Type of message. Values are: Comment—Facebook comment Direct—Twitter direct message Post—Facebook post Private—Facebook private message Reply—Twitter or Facebook reply Retweet—Twitter retweet Tweet—Twitter tweet

Notes.description: Notes added by Social Hub actions for the social post.

OutboundSocialAccountId.description: ID of the social account used for outbound social posts.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the social post.

ParentId.description: ID of the parent record of the social post, for example, the ID of a case.

PersonaId.description: ID of the social persona who made the post.

PostPriority.description: Priority of the social post set in Social Studio.

PostTags.description: Comma-separated list of tags on the social post.

Posted.description: Date and time when the social post was made.

Provider.description: Social network of the social post.

R6PostId.description: Unique ID of the post in Social Studio.

R6SourceId.description: ID of the author in Social Studio.

R6TopicId.description: ID for either the topic profile or the managed account in Social Studio.

Recipient.description: ID of the recipient of the social post in Social Studio.

RecipientType.description: Type of the recipient of the social post, such as a person.

ReplyToId.description: Dynamically generated from replyToExternalPostId in Social Studio.

ResponseContextExternalId.description: External ID, such as a conversation ID, author ID, or post ID, for the item you’re responding to.

ReviewScale.description: Review scale for the social post.

ReviewScore.description: Review score for the social post.

ReviewedStatus.description: Status of the social post review.

Sentiment.description: Sentiment of the social post. Values are: Negative Neutral Positive SomewhatNegative SomewhatPositive

Shares.description: Number of times the social post has been shared.

SourceTags.description: Comma-separated list of author type tags.

SpamRating.description: Spam rating of the social post. Values are: NotSpam Spam

Status.description: Status of the social post. Values are: DELETED FAILED HIDDEN PENDING PENDING_APPROVAL RECALL_APPROVAL REJECTED_APPROVAL REPLIED SENT UNKNOWN

StatusMessage.description: Status message for the social post.

TopicProfileName.description: Name of the topic profile for the social post in Social Studio.

TopicType.description: Type of topic. Values are: Keyword Managed

TruncatedContent.description: Truncated content of the social post.

UniqueCommentors.description: Number of unique people who commented on the social post.

ViewCount.description: Number of times the social post was viewed.

WhoId.description: Polymorphic ID of a person such as a lead or a contact.
